General.Name: Gaming Technologies Inc. Common Stock
General.Description: Gaming Technologies, Inc., a software company, engages in online gaming business in Mexico. It operates vale.mx, an online casino and sportsbook; and provides consulting and management services related to their interactive online betting and gaming business. The company was formerly known as Dito, Inc. and changed its name to Gaming Technologies, Inc. in December 2020. Gaming Technologies, Inc. was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Las Vegas, Nevada.
General.Address: Two Summerlin, Las Vegas, NV, United States, 89135
